title: Red queue timer
body: Hey, enyone could explain what this means? If you are wondering, I had gotten into low priority queue few days ago, but already played more than 10 games. This is happenning for me in all types of queues.

replies.body: This means that you or a player in the queue is under LeaverBuster restriction and their penalty time would need to be consumed (5, 10 or 20 minutes) before the queue starts searching for matches - at which point the caution sign would disappear.

The red timer is the amount of time remaining on someone's low priority queue. Since it's been a few hours since this was posted, I'm not sure if you're still seeing this LPQ but your account looks like it doesn't have one anymore. Let me know if you're still seeing that LPQ timer and I can see what's going on!

I have the same thing, red low priority queue timer at the top right... But I just found a match in 2 minutes.

I don't see why I would have a queue dodge timer... and why I haven't been informed about said restriction, I'm with the other people here, it seems as though it is purely cosmetic and clearly a bug!

Thanks

- Russell
I seem to have the same problem as well except I haven't left any games in months and months and it only appeared today after the update.
Were in the queue with somebody who had the penalty?

I just got it but I don't have a time penalty. I think it is glitched from when I was in queue with my friend before. Anyone know if I can do anything about it? The look of it scares me T_T I have never been banned and I don't leave games almost ever.

i see this once per day. Not me or my friends had leaver buster recently.
This is kind-a bug right or ?
Or if i invite someone with leaver buster, and i kick him out later(before starting a game), can this cause the timer to pop up next 4-5 games ?

My account now has the Red ! Next to it as well, I just played a couple of games with someone in a LPQ, but haevnt been placed there myself and the games still find at the normal pace, so its merely cosmetic for me

> [{quoted}](name=Le Bangable,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iRcvawys,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-03T17:45:00.875+0000)
>
> My account now has the Red ! Next to it as well, I just played a couple of games with someone in a LPQ, but haevnt been placed there myself and the games still find at the normal pace, so its merely cosmetic for me

This is also happening to me. I just finished playing some games with my friend in LPQ but now i'm queuing solo and have the red timer still. I believe this may be a bug with the LPQ timer.

Does anyone know how long the timer will be there? A day, week, month, forever? I was in the same queue as a person who kept disconnecting. I didn't disconnect, but now I have the timer. Will it always be there when starting a match and for how long? Every time I start or what?
it's a virus.  If you play with a LBQ you get it forever
